subject: College Athletics
Football
Families and Family Life
Drug Abuse and Traffic
lead_paragraph: As Dez Bryant returns to his home state Saturday for No. 7 Oklahoma State’s game at No. 1 Texas, his on-field success is less remarkable than his escape from a tumultuous childhood.
snippet: As Dez Bryant returns to his home state Saturday for No. 7 Oklahoma State’s game at No. 1 Texas, his on-field success is less remarkable than his escape from a tumultuous childhood.
